name: Inverse Sushibar reinvest
description: Supplies {{token}} to [SushiBar](https://app.sushi.com/stake) to earn protocol fees, then further lends xSUSHI to [Inverse Finance](https://www.inverse.finance/anchor) to earn INV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Inverse Sushibar reinvest
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [SushiBar](https://app.sushi.com/stake) to earn protocol fees, then further lends xSUSHI to [Inverse Finance](https://www.inverse.finance/anchor) to earn INV. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Inverse Sushibar reinvest
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [SushiBar](https://app.sushi.com/stake) pour gagner une partie des frais de protocole, puis prête xSUSHI sur [Inverse Finance](https://www.inverse.finance/anchor) pour gagner des INV. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Inverse Sushibar reinvest
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [SushiBar](https://app.sushi.com/stake) para ganar tarifas de protocolo, luego presta más xSUSHI a [Inverse Finance](https://www.inverse.finance/anchor) para ganar INV. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Inverse Sushibar reinvest
tr.description: Protokol ücreti kazanmak için [SushiBar](https://app.sushi.com/stake)'a {{token}} sağlar, ardından INV kazanmak için xSUSHI'yi [Inverse Finance](https://www.inverse.finance/anchor)'a ödünç verir. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.
